attributes.action: Call a general election by the end of 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to petition the Prime Minister and the Labour government to call a general election by the end of 2008.
i think it is time for the UK nation to have their voices and opinions heard on various things that effect the people.
These things are,
UK economy
EU membership
Immigration
Foreign policy
Crime
Enviroment

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
